title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: AAVE Declines 5.3%, Leading Index Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Chainlink (LINK) was also among the underperformers, falling 4.7% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2547.72, down 1.0% (-26.77) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Two of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+1.0%) and ADA (+0.2%).

Laggards: AAVE (-5.3%) and LINK (-4.7%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 1.0% with most assets trading lower, led by significant drops in AAVE (-5.3%) and LINK (-4.7%).
